name: Miss Neko 2
description:
Welcome to the magic island — Nekoland! All the good things you want will happen here! Solve the match puzzles, collect the magic coins!

Unlock different types of catgirls and reveal the secrets on them. Find different ways to play ingeniously. Come and explore! Nekoland is waiting for you to work miracles!

FEATURES

  • 30 levels of relaxed puzzle match game
  • 8 charming magic cats
  • Knowledge of cats all around the world
  • Top-notch 2D animation performance
  • ♥CG Gallery Mode♥
  • 100 achievements
